page.title: 18THE FUTURE OF PORTESSIE?
page.content: BY THE YEAR 2086, A BIG CHANGE WILL HAVE TAKEN PLACE IN THE WORLD. I THINK THAT THE WORLD WILL BE FULL OF COMPUTERS, MAYBE EVEN RULED BY COMPUTERS AND ROBOTS. CARS WILL HAVE MINDS OF THEIR OWN AND WILL BE ABLE TO TALK TO YOU. MAYBE, THEY WILL EVEN DRIVE YOU WHERE YOU WANT. HOLIDAYS WILL BE SPENT IN SPACE, IN A SPACE HOTEL. THERE WILL BE HUNDREDS OF ROCKETS TO TAKE YOU THERE. IT WILL BE JUST LIKE CATCHING A BUS. THE WEATHER WILL BE CONTROLLED BY PEOPLE USING A MACHINE IN SPACE. IT WILL RAIN WHEN ONE WISHES AND THE SUN WILL SHINE WHEN NEEDED. PEOPLE WILL BE ABLE TO LIVE FOR AS LONG AS THEY WISH. NO ONE WILL DIE BECAUSE OF ALL THE MEDICINES THAT WILL BE INVENTED. I THINK THAT IN A HUNDRED YEARS EVERYTHING WILL HAVE CHANGED A LOT.
